storyInfo: Cantabile saves a fowlbeast that suddenly flew into her life, and saves herself in the process.

attributes.text: I never did go back to visit that child I saved...
I'm afraid... As I am now, can I really help her move forward in the right direction?
What if... because of me, she instead...

attributes.content: Cantabile, after deliberation, the Doctor and Dr. Kal'tsit have determined that in your current state you are no longer fit to continue conducting missions as a field operator.
attributes.name: Field Operator

attributes.content: But even so, you must eat your meals regularly, understood? Prolonged starvation is extremely bad for your health, especially as an Infected.
attributes.name: Field Operator

attributes.content: You aren't responsible for that person getting injured, nor are you being punished for making a mistake during the mission. The issue is how you mishandled things after the mistake.
attributes.name: Field Operator

attributes.text: Even when it comes to my own affairs, I...

attributes.content: Are you listening, Cantabile? Then, uh... go ahead and rest up first. Once you're feeling better, figure out where you went wrong, and we'll go on another mission together then. How does that sound?
attributes.name: Field Operator

attributes.content: Also, we'd really appreciate it if you told us why you're taking this out on yourself by skipping meals. If you're willing, that is...
attributes.name: Field Operator

attributes.content: If I'm willing...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Mission report... Our objective was to help the villagers fight off a gang of bandits that had been harassing them.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I injured a client. I was supposed to help them, but I ended up hurting him.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Because I... I didn't want to see anyone lose their life during the mission. So I accidentally... injured the villager who was about to kill one of the bandits.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I... don't know what his circumstances were. What if he had been seriously wounded by the bandit before, and I didn't know? Should I have looked into his background before making a decision?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: No, no. The squad leader said that wasn't where I made my mistake...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: But I was told that Rhodes Island's primary mission was to save people and treat diseases. I hurt someone they were trying to save, yet somehow I didn't do anything wrong, and don't deserve punishment...?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: And where I went wrong was how I handled my mistake? How I handled it...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.text: 1437, here's your meal. Fill yourself up, and tomorrow a teacher will come to instruct you in music and literature.

attributes.content: ...Meal? But... isn't it still alive?

attributes.text: It's not alive. It's food. You have to eat it. Have you already forgotten your first day here? How it felt to have a full stomach?

attributes.content: I felt... my strength returning to me.

attributes.text: Yes, that's right. Strength. You could stand, you could run, you could jump. No more vomiting up sour bile as expected, no more closing your eyes while writhing in pain. Isn't that right? You don't want an end like that, do you?

attributes.content: But... But...
Blurgh...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Cantabile crumples the report in front of her, unwilling to write any more.
She reaches for another sheet of paper on which to write her analysis of what went wrong. But in the end, all she has to show for her efforts is a pile of wadded-up paper.
I know why I'm like this, but I don't want to write it down... Damn it, why am I like this...?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Cantabile? Are you in there? It's almost time for lunch, and the Medical Department will be coming around over the next few days to remind you to eat on time.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: Did you make sure to eat breakfast?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: I... Yes, I did.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Good. I believe you, so I hope you'll return our trust as well. Please eat well, and get enough nutrition. We'll give you a routine checkup in a few days, alright?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: What was that?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Feeble chirp)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: How... did you get in here? Did I forget to close the windows?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Pecks at the grains of rice on the table)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: Are you... someone's pet?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Excuse me, I'd like to know if you ever... raised a pet fowlbeast?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Nope! Unfortunately, I don't have the money to keep a pet...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: But if you ever need any pet-care items fixed, feel free to come see me!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I'm the one who fixed up Vanilla's pet water dispenser!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Excuse me, are you Operator Vanilla? A fowlbeast flew into my dormitory, and I was wondering if it might be yours?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I'm afraid not. The only pets I have are these cute little Originium slugs.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: How about it? Want one for yourself?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I-I'm good!
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Maybe try asking Instructor Dur-nar? She might be secretly raising them for her little patients!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Actually, there've been quite a few pets out in the courtyard lately. Some of the operators release them there after raising them for a while. Maybe you can ask Perfumer or Beanstalk. If anybody knows, it'll be them!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: A fowlbeast? I thought you said you wanted to raise a baby metal crab? Why the change of heart?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: No, it isn't mine. It just happened to fly into my dorm... But I don't think I have what it takes to care for such a tiny life, so I can't just go and adopt it.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Be it a fowlbeast or a metal crab, is it really acceptable for me to self-righteously declare myself its master? What if I can't take care of it, or what if it doesn't want to...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: What makes you say that? Look, you've searched all over, and it doesn't belong to anyone here at Rhodes Island. Instead, it flew into your dorm asking you for help. Which means it chose you.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Just like this little crab here chose to save me out in the wilds.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: So why not give it a try? You might end up being a great owner, or a good friend.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: 'A great owner'?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: There's no need to be so anxious— Woah, are you shaking? Are you... afraid of fowlbeasts?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: No, how could I be afraid of something so tiny? It's just that...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Hmm? Afraid you don't have enough experience? Fear not— I'm the best there is at taking care of pets, and I'll teach you everything you need to know!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Look, stroke it gently just like this. Show it your kindness, and you'll earn its trust. It's not that hard!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Even a shy little crab like Peacake will start getting affectionate once she gets to know how kind you are.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: But, I've never... Beanstalk, I've never kept a pet before, so I have no idea what to do. Before, I've only... seen them dead...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: If I try to take care of it, will it... end up dying?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: —No way! It probably just can't fly right now because it hurt its wings. Don't be so nervous!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: After you get back, build a little nest for it, provide enough food and water, and give it some room to move around. That's it for the basics, so make sure to take good care of it!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Okay, I...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Lies down on the table)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: Oh, you're still here.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: You have no master here, and I left the window open. Yet you stayed, even after I fed you.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Scoots closer to Cantabile)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: ...Stay away from me! I still have my weapon, and I've never raised anything like you before—I, I'm afraid I might...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Cowers)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... Sorry, it's my fault...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Y-Your wings... Beanstalk said you might need some anti-inflammatory medicine and bandages.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I've never done anything like this before, but...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: J-Just stay right there and don't move... I'll apply the medicine.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: The fowlbeast senses that Cantabile is trying to help it, and shifts over to get closer to her finger.
...Eek! Why did you move closer all of a sudden? Did I hurt you?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Spreads its wings effortlessly)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: I see, so you're fine... the medicine is working.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I'll go get something for you to eat.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Because... Because it's still alive...

attributes.text: If you won't do as you're told, you're free to leave.

attributes.content: ...No! I don't want to!

attributes.text: Then eat it, or get out of here and starve to death. Eat now, and tomorrow we'll feed you what we normally have. After class is over, you can take a walk around outside. We'll even let you visit the garden.
Haven't you always wanted to play on the swings outside?
What about those classmates of yours? Why don't you ever talk to them?

attributes.content: I... I thought I wasn't supposed to talk to them?

attributes.text: You must. You must communicate. You must fit in. You can't act like an alien.

attributes.content: ...Okay.

attributes.text: Go make friends. Get acquainted with them. Let them meet a new friend, a bright and promising student.

attributes.content: ...Yes.

attributes.text: You'll be allowed to move freely around the manor. We've enrolled you in school, and next month you'll be able to go to the School of Literary Studies and the Conservatory to continue your education. Your tutor will go with you.

attributes.content: ...Thank you.

attributes.text: How do you feel when you attend a funeral? Those people over there are crying, and I see that you're shedding tears as well.

attributes.content: My mission is complete, and thus a funeral follows. But... that warrants the shedding of tears.
If you get hurt, should I cry—or should I feel sorrow?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: But right now, it feels like... I can't feel anything.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I can't feel anything at all.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Tries to get closer)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: ...Stay away from me!
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Are you not afraid of me? Why are you... trying to get closer?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: There are so many others here. Why did you have to fly into my room? There are so many kind, gentle, and warm people here. They...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: They grew up in a safe environment. They've never witnessed cruelty. They know how to take care of you... But, I'm trembling. Can't you see that?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I'm probably going to end up hurting you, so... you shouldn't stay with me any longer!
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Because I have no idea how I should treat you!
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: ...So why won't you leave?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Your injuries aren't serious. If you hadn't come into my dorm, or if you'd flown out by yourself onto the deck, someone would've seen you and come to help...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Maybe... I can help you with that...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Cowers hesitantly)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: Do you... want to be free?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Medic, can you take a look at my injury? I kinda can't feel my back anymore...
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Tell me the truth. This rock here's beyond treatment, isn't it?
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: (This place is... the sickbay? How did I end up here? The fowlbeast...)
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (In the end, I couldn't throw it out... Instead, here I am, outside...)
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (If I really were to do that, then I would truly be... No, I can't throw it out.)
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (But I don't want to head back either... I already bothered Beanstalk earlier, so I can't cause her any more trouble. The Doctor's too busy and doesn't have time for this nonsense...)
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Medic... Maybe the same medic who saved me?)
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Excuse me, but do you mind if I ask why there are so few staff here today?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Engineering found a collapse along our navigation route, which buried many of the people from nearby villages. Almost half of the Medical Department's gone out to rescue them.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Are you looking for anyone in particular? Or are you here for your routine checkup?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Actually... I wanted to see the medic who first rescued me when I came to Rhodes Island. I wanted to talk to her, but she's not here.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Do you know when she'll be back? ...I miss her a little.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Hard to say. I'm not sure what the situation is like out there, but I'm guessing tomorrow at the earliest?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I see... Then I'll head back for now. Thank you.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Wait, that's not the way to the dorms.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I... I'd like to take a stroll first.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Is everything alright?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I... I'm not sure...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Wait, hold on, young lady! I thought I was just seeing things, but there's a fowlbeast clinging to your back!
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: I thought you knew, but looks like you didn't notice it at all! It's gonna fall if you don't catch it!
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Cantabile reaches behind her back. The fowlbeast's talons are hooked into her clothes, the creature struggling to squeeze in behind her neck.
It's gonna fall!
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: What? Why is it...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Please, medic! Its wings are injured and it can't fly. Look... I applied some medicine and wrapped its wings, but the bandages have fallen off... Can you save it?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I've seen fowlbeasts dying before, and that's how their wings looked... Is it dying because I didn't take good care of it...?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Huh? What are you talking about? It just looks that way because its wings are a bit injured, and it can't sit still because it's had too much to eat. Just let it rest for a few days.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: ...Really? Is that all?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: The fowlbeast rests in Cantabile's hand and nestles into her palm, rubbing against her as if looking for a comfortable position.
Don't panic. There's nothing wrong with it, so why are you so nervous that you're clamming up?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Heh... How cute.
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: Young lady, that fowlbeast really trusts you. Reminds me of my old beckbeast I had back home.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Mind sitting over here and letting me take a closer look? Haven't seen one of those critters in a long while.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: I feel like my eyes are going blank, having to lie here day in, day out.
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: Huh? Do you want to fly somewhere?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: The fowlbeast flaps its wings and flies over onto the hospital bed.
Wow! It's a fowlbeast! Can I pet it?
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: You'd have to ask Cantabile first.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: May I, Cantabile?
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: Oh, you're...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Cantabile! Remember me? I'm the first person you saved! You promised you'd come visit me often, but then you never did...
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: Sorry, I... Recently, I've been a bit...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: You've been busy taking care of this fowlbeast, huh? Hmph! Well, I suppose I can forgive you.
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: The nice medic lady said that if I eat well and take my medicine like a good girl, I'll be able to raise one in the future too!
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: The fowlbeast seems to find the soft quilt quite cozy, and happily hops around on it.
Several patients get up off their beds, leaning in to look over, their eyes shining, unable to keep from smiling.
Sorry... This is a sickbay, and I shouldn't be interrupting your rest. I'll take him back first—
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Leaving already...? Why not stay a bit longer? It's nice seeing something with so much life and energy.
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: Can I pet it, miss? I've been away from home for so long, and... I haven't been able to pet my beckbeast in ages.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Of course you can... It's not like I own it or anything. Our paths just happened to cross.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Woah! That's how me and my beckbeast first met, haha.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: You know, you really are a nice person. Fowlbeasts just like this one get hurt all the time, maybe eight hundred a day if not a thousand. But hardly anyone's willing to save them. They're just like us sick folks, lucky enough to have met you people while on death's door.
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: You guys really are good people...
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: 'Good people'...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Cantabile looks at the fowlbeast, and the critter's two shiny black eyes also peer back at her.
Just then, it hops over unsteadily, trying to snuggle up to the person who rescued it.
Cantabile, the medic told me that after I get better, I can stay here and study whatever I want. And you all can help me!
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: That's just like going to school, right? I saw this word in a book that teaches you how to read, but you're my 'savior'!
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: 'Savior'...?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Haha, you little rascal. How ambitious do you have to be to want to go to school?
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: Right? The nice medic lady told me before that you know tons of words, can read books, and even play the piano! That's soooo cool!
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: Woah, is that true? Can you really play the piano?
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: A little bit, but...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: She also told me that you've even taught other people before! Can you teach me too?
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: I want to be just like you when I grow up!
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: ...There's no need for that. Just be yourself.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: The young patient picks up a small musical instrument placed at her bedside and plucks the strings clumsily, making an out-of-tune sound.
The fowlbeast chirps softly, as if to sing along.
Ahaha! You've been practicing for so long, and that's the best you can do?
attributes.name: Resting Patient

attributes.content: What are you talkin' about? She hasn't had anyone to teach her. The fact that she can even make a sound is pretty good.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: It might not be what you can call a song yet, but I don't mind listening to it every now and then.
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: A hand reaches out, covering the young patient's tiny hand—

Cantabile lightly plucks the strings, and a little ditty drifts through the quiet sickbay. She's playing a piece she's never played before. There is no score, only the mood of the moment conducting her.
Woah...
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: I wanna to learn to do that one day!
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: C'mon, it's time for dinner. Head back to your beds first, and I'll serve your meals.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: The children should also behave themselves.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Cantabile, I promise to eat well and get better! You should too, so we can get strong and healthy together!
attributes.name: Young Recovering Patient

attributes.content: Young lady, you should come visit us every now and then, when you have the time. How about it?
attributes.name: Feeble Patient

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: 'Savior.' 'Young lady.'
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Nobody's ever called me those things before...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Soft chirping)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: In the past, those people in their fancy clothes would never call me anything like that. As for the kids... I didn't dare listen to what names they had for me.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: They never once called out to me. They were merely speaking to a fabrication, a fake me that I've never known.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: But, just now... They called me a savior. They called me a young lady...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Nobody's ever called me those things before...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Hops around on the table)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: Did you know...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I've... killed people before.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I've never told this to the Doctor, or even the medic who saved me.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: They rescued me.... They brought me in, gave me food to eat and water to drink.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Was it because I was scared? Back then, I felt that the only way I could survive was by listening to them. Starving to death is such an awful thing...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: The fowlbeast fetches a grain of rice from Cantabile's untouched meal, raising its neck to swallow it.

I've killed more than one person... I always told myself, they're objects, not living beings. Those people took me to their funerals countless times, and each time, I never heard their crying as anything more than that.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: But, that last time, my target's... wife. Thinking I was her son's teacher, she begged me from beneath the rubble to save her husband I had just killed, or at least to pull out his body.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: And then, she...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: The fowlbeast pulls out another grain of rice and places it in front of Cantabile, turning its eyes up at her.
She...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: In her terror, right there in front of me, she gave birth to a...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: To a...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: ...loudly-crying child.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: The fowlbeast sees that Cantabile still hasn't moved, and continues pecking around. After eating another grain of rice, it places another in front of Cantabile and turns its head to look at her.
Cantabile's hand brushes against the Originium crystal on her arm.
I... I was wounded in the explosion... I, I also helped her patch her wounds, but dared not touch her again. I knew what Originium dust was, so...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: That was a... life. I realized, all the targets I did in before, were also lives.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I'd always been lying to myself! I lied to myself that my targets were nothing more than targets, that my food was nothing more than food.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: ...No, they were all lives.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I should never have... seen them as things, that could be exchanged for my strength, for my continued survival...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: They were not, and neither am I...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: The fowlbeast pushes the rice grains towards Cantabile, the grains it had already picked up forming a small pile.
It picks up another grain, wanting Cantabile to eat as well.
Cantabile takes one and places it into her mouth.
...I didn't die in the refugee camp. I was rescued and brought here, so I should...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I should set aside my old ways.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: (Pecks at the grains of rice)
attributes.name: Injured Fowlbeast

attributes.content: Can I... pet you?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: As... a living, breathing being?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Cantabile hesitantly reaches out to the fowlbeast.
The creature approaches little by little, until it leans in to snuggle up to her.
Her hand runs gently across its soft feathers.
I shouldn't keep it hidden anymore, should I?
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I also... shouldn't treat myself the same way. That won't accomplish anything.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I'll write down my entire past.
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: Cantabile looks at the report she had written and slides it into the file folder bag.
They will learn about these things. If they find out, then I...
attributes.name: Cantabile

attributes.content: I will know more clearly how I should behave in the future.
attributes.name: Cantabile
